commit.message: don't insert parens for self methods

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+---
+created: "2019-01-23T13:19:23.525922020+00:00"
+creator: insta@0.5.2
+expression: kind_completions
+source: crates/ra_ide_api/src/completion/completion_item.rs
+---
+[
+    CompletionItem {
+        completion_kind: Reference,
+        label: "foo",
+        kind: Some(
+            Method
+        ),
+        detail: Some(
+            "fn foo(&self)"
+        ),
+        documentation: None,
+        lookup: None,
+        insert_text: Some(
+            "foo()$0"
+        ),
+        insert_text_format: Snippet,
+        source_range: [139; 140),
+        text_edit: None
+    }
+]

@@ -1,8 +1,8 @@
 ---

 expression: kind_completions
-source: "crates\\ra_ide_api\\src\\completion\\completion_item.rs"
+source: crates/ra_ide_api/src/completion/completion_item.rs
 ---
 [
     CompletionItem {
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ source: "crates\\ra_ide_api\\src\\completion\\completion_item.rs"
         documentation: None,
         lookup: None,
         insert_text: Some(
-            "the_method($0)"
+            "the_method()$0"
         ),
         insert_text_format: Snippet,
         source_range: [144; 144),
